linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux kernel 4.15 or later
  • Processor: Dual-core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 3.0-capable
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game should run on any modern distro

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15 (Catalina) or later
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 3.0-capable
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
